backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend canister with access control, ID generation, and rich types for hotels, tickets, bundles, and trip comparisons, plus user profile queries.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions and structures used for migrating older trip comparison data into the updated bundle and comparison formats.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global layout, auth gating, and theme provider for the React app.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the complete candid IDL for backend types including users, groups, messages, hotels, amenities, tickets, and comparison inputs.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a sign‑in/sign‑out button handling Internet Identity login flow, logout, navigation, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to the sign‑in page while allowing initialization and public access to '/'.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnauthSignI: Displays a branded sign‑in screen with messaging, error display, and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/groups/ChatPanel: Implements a chat UI with scrolling, message rendering, input handling, and send action integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the app’s main layout with top navigation, footer, and automatic document title updates.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a footer with branding, current year, and a credit link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Displays the top navigation bar with branding, dynamic nav links based on auth state, profile access, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoGrid: Displays a grid of photos with hover actions for tagging people and deleting, and opens a tagging panel for the selected photo.
frontend/src/components/memory/PhotoUplo: Handles image file selection and uploads photos with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/memory/TagPeople: Modal panel for viewing, adding, and removing manual person tags on a photo, then saving updates.
frontend/src/components/offers/HotelOffe: Allows adding, editing, and removing hotel entries with room and pricing details.
frontend/src/components/offers/TicketOff: Manages creation and editing of ticket offers including type, price, and currency.
frontend/src/components/offers/Transport: Enables adding, listing, and removing transportation options with mode, provider, class, and pricing.
frontend/src/components/offers/VipOffers: UI component for creating, editing, and deleting VIPPackage entries with form handling and list display.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleCa: Displays a travel bundle with pricing, ticket, hotel, and badge indicators, including optional consent gating for purchases.
frontend/src/components/results/BundleSo: Provides a dropdown UI for selecting sorting options for bundles.
frontend/src/components/safety/PurchaseC: Gate component that requires authentication and parental consent before showing purchase-related content.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding config defining app name, tagline, and logo assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, friends, trip comparisons, and backend mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for theming, including dark mode overrides and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/currency.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/localComparisonEngine.t: Generates ticket‑hotel‑VIP‑transport bundles based on matching currencies and computes total costs; also finds cheapest matching transport.
frontend/src/lib/tripWindow.ts: Calculates check‑in and check‑out timestamps around a concert date as bigint nanoseconds.
frontend/src/lib/upgradeDetection.ts: Scores bundle components and detects cheaper higher‑quality upgrades for tickets, transport, and hotel rooms.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumPage.tsx: Displays a photo album with upload and delete functionality, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetailPage.tsx: Shows group details and chat, allowing posting messages and leaving the group with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Lists user groups and provides UI to create new groups, with loading states and sign‑in enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, branding, navigation buttons, and a features overview for concert travel savings.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryFinderPage.tsx: Displays user photo albums, supports album creation, and requires sign‑in using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile details and saved trip comparisons with delete options, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Generates and sorts travel bundles from trip data, displays upgrade info, and allows saving comparisons.
Lists saved trip comparisons with delete actions and handles unauthenticated and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Redirects signed‑in users to profile and shows an Internet Identity sign‑in screen otherwise.
frontend/src/pages/TripBuilderPage.tsx: React page for entering event details and offer options, validating inputs, and navigating to results with the trip builder state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling with ESNext modules and composite builds.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, local API proxying, and validated Internet Identity URL setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
